name: ClosertoChristwithRiley
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill includes insights from Riley's gospel studies intended to provide insight to others about the gospel of Jesus Christ. It draws from content posted at closertochrist-riley.blogspot.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
